narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This inspection occurred at the Carden Circus performance located in Marquette, MI and included observation of the 
performance. Both elephants, Betty and Janice, were inspected during and after the show. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
